SELECT a.session_id, a.name, a.avatar_url, a.target_id, a.target_type
FROM base_im_session_ref_user a
LEFT JOIN base_im_session b ON b.id = a.session_id
WHERE a.show_flag = TRUE
AND a.user_id = #{currentUserId}
ORDER BY b.last_receive_ts DESC

SELECT a.session_id, LEAST(99, COUNT(*)) AS unReadCount
FROM base_im_session_ref_user a LEFT JOIN base_im_session_content b ON b.session_id = a.session_id
WHERE a.user_id = #{currentUserId} AND b.enable_flag = TRUE AND b.create_ts > a.last_open_ts
GROUP BY a.session_id
